mapper.select: SELECT recipe_info.*, COUNT(recipe_likes.rcp_idx) AS likes_count FROM recipe_info LEFT JOIN recipe_likes ON recipe_info.rcp_idx = recipe_likes.rcp_idx GROUP BY recipe_info.rcp_idx;
mapper.insert: insert into recipe_info (user_id, rcp_name, rcp_ingredient, rcp_image, rcp_desc, created_at, rcp_views) values (#{user_id}, #{rcp_name}, #{rcp_ingredient}, #{rcp_image}, #{rcp_desc}, now(), 0)
mapper.select: select rcp_likes from recipe_likes where user_id = #{user_id} and rcp_idx = #{rcp_idx}
mapper.insert: insert into recipe_likes (user_id, rcp_idx, rcp_likes) values (#{user_id}, #{rcp_idx}, 1)
mapper.delete: delete from recipe_likes where user_id = #{user_id} and rcp_idx = #{rcp_idx}
mapper.select: SELECT rcp_idx, AVG(sweet) AS sweet, AVG(bitter) AS bitter, AVG(salty) AS salty, AVG(sour) AS sour, AVG(spicy) AS spicy, AVG(puckery) AS puckery FROM recipe_taste_info GROUP BY rcp_idx;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO recipe_taste_info (rcp_idx, sweet, bitter, salty, sour, spicy, puckery, user_id) VALUES (#{rcp_idx}, #{sweet}, #{bitter}, #{salty}, #{sour}, #{spicy}, #{puckery}, #{user_id})
